objects.text:
Premium Chronograph Design
Ionic Plated Black Steel
Limited Time Discount
Exclusive Early Access

product_details.name: BOSS Cloud Qtz Fashion Chrono Grey Round Dial Men's Analog Watch|Ionic Plated Black Steel Material|Black Color Band - 1514016
product_details.description: Brand: BOSS. Model: 1514016. Model Name: 1514016. Product Dimensions: 16 x 4.4 x 4.4 cm; 148 g. Batteries: 1 12V batteries required. (included). Special Features: Easy Reader, Lightweight, Glow In The Dark, Second Hand, Scratch-Resistant. Display Type: Analog. Power Source: Battery Powered. Batteries Included: Yes. Batteries Required: Yes. Battery cell composition: Silver Oxide. Speaker Diameter: 44 Millimeters. Country of Origin: Hong Kong. Item Weight: 148 g. Importer: MGI Distribution Pvt Ltd.210/2 Bellary road, sadashiv nagar 2nd floor upper Palace Orchards Bengalure- 560080. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 16 x 4.4 x 4.4 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Casual Watch.

banner_details:
The banner design showcases a sleek and modern promotional layout for a luxury watch, with a strong diagonal split background blending deep navy and rich gold gradients. The primary heading layer (`heading`) and subheading (`subheading`) are bold and futuristic, using stylized fonts to attract attention, with contrasting white and gold text. The brand name (`product_name`) is featured prominently in uppercase white, followed by a list of product features (`description`) in clean, legible white typography. A motivational tagline (`tagline`) in gold adds energy to the offer, while a large, bold price (`price`) reinforces the deal. The call-to-action (`cta`) sits within a gold rectangular button (`cta_background`), encouraging immediate clicks. A realistic product image (`product_image`) is placed on the right, balancing the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A2647
- Deep Blue: #144272
- Gold: #E5C687
- Rich Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Blue (CTA text): #0A2647
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and sophisticated watch that predominantly uses a monochromatic dark color palette. The watch features a matte gunmetal gray dial (#5C5C5C), subtly contrasted with black detailing such as the chronograph sub-dials, hour markers, and bezel (#1A1A1A). Minimal use of white (#FFFFFF) in the sub-dial hands and small white markers adds clarity and sharpness, while the black metallic bracelet enhances the modern, industrial feel. The overall harmony is achieved through a seamless blend of muted tones, high-contrast detailing, and brushed metal textures that communicate elegance and rugged precision—ideal for a sleek, masculine advertisement banner.
